prompt:
The image showcases an intricate fabric texture that beautifully represents the Japanese style. This pattern is composed of alternating waves and swirls, creating a sense of motion and fluidity across the fabric. Each wave exhibits a unique blue hue, punctuated with white swirls and a subtle hint of light blue at the crest of each wave. 

The overall aesthetic of this design can be described as an abstract representation of ocean waves, capturing the dynamic energy of water in motion. The pattern is uniformly distributed throughout the fabric, ensuring that the design is consistent across all areas.
